item.title: Cyber Insights 2026: Zero Trust and Following the Path
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
Zero Trust is not a thing; it is an idea. It is not a product; it is a concept – it is a destination that has no precise route and may never be reached.

The post Cyber Insights 2026: Zero Trust and Following the Path appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Google Disrupts IPIDEA Proxy Network
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
One of the largest residential proxy networks, IPIDEA enrolled devices through SDKs for mobile and desktop.

The post Google Disrupts IPIDEA Proxy Network  appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: PwC and Google Cloud Ink $400 Million Deal to Scale AI-Powered Defense
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
The announcement comes just weeks after Palo Alto Networks and Google Cloud announced a multibillion-dollar AI and cloud security deal.

The post PwC and Google Cloud Ink $400 Million Deal to Scale AI-Powered Defense appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Cyber Insights 2026: Offensive Security; Where It Is and Where It’s Going
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
Malicious attacks are increasing in frequency, sophistication and damage. Defenders need to find and harden system weaknesses before attackers can attack them.

The post Cyber Insights 2026: Offensive Security; Where It Is and Where It’s Going appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Mesh Security Raises $12 Million for CSMA Platform
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
The investment will allow Mesh to advance its autonomous, agentic capabilities, and scale sales and customer support efforts.

The post Mesh Security Raises $12 Million for CSMA Platform appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Why We Can’t Let AI Take the Wheel of Cyber Defense
item.dc:creator: Steve Durbin
item.description:
The fastest way to squander the promise of AI is to mistake automation for assurance, and novelty for resilience.

The post Why We Can’t Let AI Take the Wheel of Cyber Defense appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: Rein Security Emerges From Stealth With $8M, Bringing Inside-Out AppSec Approach
item.dc:creator: Kevin Townsend
item.description:
Rein aims to close the production visibility gap by stopping attacks inside the application runtime.

The post Rein Security Emerges From Stealth With $8M, Bringing Inside-Out AppSec Approach appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: WhatsApp Boosts Account Security for At-Risk Individuals
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
New Strict Account Settings allow users to block attachments and media and silence calls from unknown people.

The post WhatsApp Boosts Account Security for At-Risk Individuals appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: US Charges 31 More Defendants in Massive ATM Hacking Probe
item.dc:creator: Eduard Kovacs
item.description:
A total of 87 individuals, mostly Venezuelan nationals, have been charged for their role in the ATM jackpotting scheme.

The post US Charges 31 More Defendants in Massive ATM Hacking Probe appeared first on SecurityWeek.

item.title: APTs, Cybercriminals Widely Exploiting WinRAR Vulnerability
item.dc:creator: Ionut Arghire
item.description:
Russian and Chinese state-sponsored threat actors have been exploiting CVE-2025-8088 since July 2025.

The post APTs, Cybercriminals Widely Exploiting WinRAR Vulnerability appeared first on SecurityWeek.
